details.title: Comment on "Gyro Misalignment and Encoder Quantization Effects During Multi-Axis Evaluation of Strapdown Gyros"
details.abstract: A recent paper1 discusses certain aspects of strapdown attitude error sources. It is pointed out here that the long term effects of these and several additional sources have previously been determined, within the framework of a complete attitude reference [4] and navigation [5] system.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
